release.action: Fixed strange saving behavior.
Added frontend microservices architecture for logging.
Added native support for Assembly language.
Added missing C# preprocessor directives.
Added FastColoredTextBox component as Git Submodule.
Changed default theme and added light and dark themes.
Changed icons in frontend.
Fixed saving file does not detect syntax.
Added support for Batch syntax highlighting.
Added support for JSON syntax highlighting.
Fixed issue with Tab Count.
Fixed issue with CSharp Strings.
Fixed file already open not activating automatically.
Fixed Zooming in with Ctrl+Scroll Throws an error.
Fixed Application asks user twice if they want to save the current information.
Fixed broken status bar.
Fixed issue with current tab behavior.
Uplifted project to .NET 4.8.
Fixed file names associated with early development.
Added right click menu.
Fixed font change crashing application.
Fixed issues with closing tabs via x button.
Fixed IndexOutOfRangeException when opening files with no extension.
Implement DockPanel Suite.
Implement diffmerge feature.
Changing language causes CurrentTB changed flag to be set to true.
Editor does not recognize .vbs extension.
App crashes when clicking File/Open submenu after fresh start.
Duplicate files can be opened several times.
Current editor language does not change on save.
Implement the ability to comment selected lines.
Remove Batch file and Java support.
Save file button should be dithered while data is clean.
Minor UI Improvements and Bug Fixes.
Tab list should always contain at least one tab.
Added logger system to application and updated FastColoredTextBox.
Missing some Shortcuts.
Added about page.
ISSUE-0008: Adding source code files to save file dialog.
ISSUE-0043: Enhanced Java Support.
ISSUE-0054: Fixed editor starting with syntax highlighting set to batch.
ISSUE-0052: Fixed DocumentMap UI Issue.
Added refresh button icon and main editor icon.
Added refresh button to tool strip.
Fixed Using "X" button on tabstrip causes documentmap to retain image.
Fixed files opening when changing syntax.
Added support for batch file syntax highlighting.
Fixed: Plain text files being loaded with wrong syntax after pasting.
Added a document map.
Adding hotkeys for basic functionality.
Implemented code and removed unneeded code to implement existing features.
Added font dialog (only supports monospaced fonts).
Fixing automatic resizing of editor.
Fixing syntax detection upon opening a file.
Resolved #20.
Resolved #9.
REVERT: Resolves #11.
Resolves #11.
Resolves #3 and #13.
Resolves #10.
Resolves #6 and Reformatting all some documentation.
Adding syntax highlighting using FastColoredTextBox and Resolving #4.
Resolved #2.
Resolved #1.
Adding find function and Enhancing save functions.
